|chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = U.FL |antenna = |txchains = 1 |rxchains = 1 |sstreams = 1 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |acqam = |802.11ac = 433 |nqam = |802.11n = 150 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = '''[https://github.com/tomaspinho/rtl8821ce rtl8821ce]''' |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = Foxconn |manuf_model = U98H132 |manuf_rev = .00 |addchip = |flags = Wave2, MU-MIMO, Bluetooth 4.2, |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = reference design |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 12/12/2016 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== :OEM: [[Foxconn]] (Hon Hai) U98H132.[https://www.ebay.com/itm/Realtek-RTL8821CE-Wireless-Wifi-Bluetooth-4-2-Mini-PCIe-Card-802-11-b-g-n-ac/273573794249 00] {{See also|Realtek reference design}} *[[Realtek#ac|Realtek]] RTL8821CE - PCIe 1.1 (WLAN)/USB 2.0 (BT) :802.11abgn+ac 1T1R (1x1:1), Wave2, MU-MIMO, BT 4.2 *[[Realtek RTL8821CE Combo Module]] :''802.11abgn/ac RTL8821CE Combo Module'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TX2-RTL8821CE TX2-RTL8821CE] (2016-12-12) :IC: 6317A-RTL8821CE; 3.3V/0.5A *Lenovo notebook models: :[[Lenovo]] ''IdeaPad'' S540-14IWL Touch (81QX), :S540-14IWL (81ND), S540-14API (81NH), :C340-14IWL (81N4), FLEX-14IWL (81SQ), :C340-14API (81N6), FLEX-14API (81SS) :[[Lenovo]] ''ThinkPad'' E570, 720S-13ARR *[http://pci-ids.ucw.cz/read/PC/10ec/c821 PCI ID: '''10ec:c821''' on ''pci-ids.ucw.cz''] :[[HP]] [https://ubuntugeeks.com/questions/272808/how-to-install-wi-fi-driver-for-realtek-rtl8821ce-on-ubuntu-18-04 All-in-One] • [10ec:c821/103c:831a] :[[Lenovo]] [https://ubuntugeeks.com/questions/150691/wifi-not-working-on-lenovo-thinkpad-e570 ''ThinkPad'' E570] • [10ec:c821/17aa:c024] 
#root@HP:~# lspci -nnk | grep -A2 0280
 Network controller [0280]: Realtek Semiconductor Co., Ltd. 
 RTL8821CE 802.11ac PCIe Wireless Network Adapter [10ec:c821]
 Subsystem: Hewlett-Packard Company RTL8821CE 
 802.11ac PCIe Wireless Network Adapter [103c:831a]

#root@ThinkPad-E570:~# lspci -nnk | grep 0280 -A3
 Network controller [0280]: Realtek Semiconductor Co., Ltd. 
 Device [10ec:c821] Subsystem: Lenovo Device [17aa:c024]
*Linux driver: [https://github.com/tomaspinho/rtl8821ce rtl8821ce] ([https://github.com/endlessm/linux/tree/master/drivers/net/wireless/rtl8821ce ''GitHub'']) 
#ifdef CONFIG_RTL8821C
 {PCI_DEVICE(PCI_VENDER_ID_REALTEK, 0xC821), .driver_data = RTL8821C},
 {PCI_DEVICE(PCI_VENDER_ID_REALTEK, 0xC82A), .driver_data = RTL8821C},
 {PCI_DEVICE(PCI_VENDER_ID_REALTEK, 0xC82B), .driver_data = RTL8821C},
==See also== :;[[Realtek reference design]] *[[Realtek RTL8821AE Combo Module]] (10ec:8821) :''802.11abgn/ac RTL8821AE Combo Module'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TX2-RTL8821AE TX2-RTL8821AE] (2013-07-10) :*[[Realtek RTL8821AENF Combo Module]] ::OEM: [[Foxconn]] T77H609.00 • [https://www.ebay.com/itm/Realtek-RTL8821AENF-Wireless-LAN-Wifi-Bluetooth-4-0-NGFF-Network-Card-802-11ac/273410580148 NGFF] *[[Realtek RTL8821AU Combo Module]] :''802.11abgn/ac RTL8821AU Combo Module'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TX2-RTL8821AU TX2-RTL8821AU] (2014-03-06) *[[Realtek RTL8821CE Combo Module]] (10ec:c821) :''802.11abgn/ac RTL8821CE Combo Module'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TX2-RTL8821CE TX2-RTL8821CE] (2016-12-12) [[Category:English Documentation]]
